title: Custard Cup, Cover, And Saucer, 1900–10
signed:
Saucer: Imperial eagle on green shield and "made in Russia by Kornilow Bros. for Tiffany and Co., New York".
Cup: Only "Made in Russia by Kornilow Bros. for Tiffany and Co., New York".
description: On flaring foot an egg-shaped cup and knob-less cover; angular handle.  Curved saucer.  Both the cup and saucer are decorated with red and blue hexagonal cartouches with animals. Between the cartouches are green trees, above red stars and below, yellow trees and a red line with dents.

tombstone.epitaph:
Custard Cup, Cover, And Saucer, 1900–10.
1900–10. Porcelain, overglazed decoration. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1956-188-3-a/c.
